entity.name: Gavin Newsom
entity.description: Candidate for Governor of California Gavin Newsom

text: @GavinNewsom Governor Newsom, I have read that tRump has cut federal funding for continued COVID-19 testing to 5 states. It appears that most of these states are red states. What will you do if he cuts funding to California?
